assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The author(s) report no conflicts of interest associated with the outcome or publication of the research described.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: All study participants provided informed consent and were enrolled under respective IRB protocols, PRO10030036 (Pittsburgh), OKB-5-2/15, 772/15, and 1003/18 (Poznan), 2010-578-f-S (Münster), 0102004794 (New York) (GEMINI Consortium), 254/M-17, 21.12.2015 (Tartu) (GEMINI Consortium), or approval by the human ethics committees of Monash Surgical Private Hospital (Clayton), Monash Medical Centre and Monash University (Melbourne).
